A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: iN one sentence this is disappointment.\nIs this a bad movie? No. But it is not a good movie. As a Star Wars fun\, I am disappointed. It has plot holes\, misused characters\, some of the worst comedy moments (not counting Jar Jar)\, butchers old characters at the expense of not known characters\, puts two-dimensional women for sake of sticking them in\, go against what we saw in previous movies (Star Wars lore)\, sticks \"sell-able\" toys left and right\, and of course promotes lots of political agendas\, which is such a shame\, because some of the visuals are breathtaking\, some of the concepts are interesting (albeit poorly executed)\, ships design\, costumes\, and creatures (minus Porgs) are great.\nBut to put the question \"is this a bad movie?\" in perspective - I'd rather watch Episode 2.
